Name: Kingdom Watcher
About the game: In Kingdom Watcher, players combine the best of skill and strategy for a calculating and intense battle against the Troll King and his army. Kingdom Watcher is the ultimate blend of tower defense and shoot 'em up, where you build towers to help protect your castle, and put your bow and arrow skills to the test against the waves of cute and evil enemies. Do you have what it takes to watch over your kingdom? Key Features First person archery action Build your defenses with 3 tower choices Upgrade your defenses into 6 different towers Duel online in an archery free-for-all
